entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 19. POP 40%
entry.summary: Showers ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 19. UV index 8 or very high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023
